creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil, multicolored randa and embroidered neck opening; Warp stripes of blue, purple, orange and green make up central half of garment, on either side is white warp; weft yarns of red? and lavendar? create a ghost-stripe effect; hemmed at lower edge.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
